text: VX Sagittarii, also known as HIP 88838, is a red hypergiant star with a diameter pulsating between 1.120 and 1.940 times Sun, a temperature between 3.200 and 3.400 degrees Kelvin. The star has a pulsation period of 732 days and is located 1.5 kiloparsecs away from the Earth. Older studies show significantly higher temperatures. == Related pages == * Orion (constellation) == References == Category:Red giants
title: VX Sagittarii
